```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────┐

│  [Main Content Area]                    │
│                                         │

└─────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

### 7.2 Key Interactions

| Interaction | Trigger | Result |
|-------------|---------|--------|
| [Action 1] | [User action] | [System response] |
| [Action 2] | [User action] | [System response] |

### 7.3 Responsive Behavior

| Breakpoint | Width | Layout Changes |
|------------|-------|----------------|
| Mobile | < 768px | [Changes] |
| Tablet | 768-1024px | [Changes] |
| Desktop | > 1024px | [Changes] |

### 7.4 Accessibility Requirements

- [ ] Color contrast 4.5:1 minimum
- [ ] Touch targets 44x44px minimum
- [ ] Keyboard navigation support
- [ ] Screen reader labels
- [ ] Focus indicators visible

## 8. Technical Requirements

### 8.1 Data Model

```typescript
interface [EntityName] {
  id: string;
  // Add fields here
  createdAt: Date;
  updatedAt: Date;
}
```

### 8.2 API Endpoints

| Endpoint | Method | Purpose | Request | Response |
|----------|--------|---------|---------|----------|
| `/api/[resource]` | GET | List all | Query params | Array of entities |
| `/api/[resource]/:id` | GET | Get one | Path param | Single entity |
| `/api/[resource]` | POST | Create | Entity body | Created entity |
| `/api/[resource]/:id` | PUT | Update | Entity body | Updated entity |
| `/api/[resource]/:id` | DELETE | Delete | Path param | Success/Error |

### 8.3 State Management

| State | Location | Initial Value |
|-------|----------|---------------|
| [State 1] | Redux slice: `[sliceName]` | [Initial value] |
| [State 2] | Local component state | [Initial value] |

### 8.4 Performance Requirements

| Metric | Target |
|--------|--------|
| Initial load time | < 2 seconds |
| Interaction response | < 200ms |
| Data sync | < 1 second |
| Offline support | Required / Not Required |

### 8.5 Browser Support

| Browser | Minimum Version |
|---------|-----------------|
| Chrome | 90+ |
| Firefox | 88+ |
| Safari | 14+ |
| Edge | 90+ |
| iOS Safari | 14+ |
| Chrome Mobile | 90+ |
